column5: Posting my wife's blog article about our guy's trip last June. This was the third trip to this camp and it was fantastic fishing as always. This is a camp for those who enjoy hiking, beautiful scenery, solitude, and largemouth and smallmouth bass...lots of them!!! If you take the time to read it, I hope you enjoy it!https://stephsimply.com/

You're welcome, Bill. It's not a camp for everyone, for sure, but our group enjoys it. If anyone has any questions about the camp, feel free to pm me or use the e-mail listed at the end of the blog article. John
